General.Name: Berjaya Assets Bhd
General.Description: Berjaya Assets Berhad, an investment holding company, primarily engages in gaming and related activities in Malaysia, the Cayman Islands, Singapore, and the United Kingdom. It operates through three segments: Gaming and Related Activities, Property Development and Property Investment, and Recreation and Others. The company operates number forecast lotteries in Sarawak; and provides lottery consultancy and related services. It is also involved in the investment and development of properties; operation of a hotel, theme park, and car park; management of a ferry terminal; leasing of a theatre; and vehicle assembly, and manufacture and sale of engines and transmissions, as well as general trading and the provision of commission agency services. The company was formerly known as Matrix International Berhad. Berjaya Assets Berhad is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
